msbt.message: So I know this is totes out of nowhere, but ohmigosh I L-O-V-E love amusement-park rides!At first they're totes scary, but once you ride one, you get SO hooked!, if you and me went to an amusement park, which ride would you try?
Roller coaster!
Log ride!
Bungee jumping!
A roller coaster, huh? Those are GREAT for just screaming away all your stress!But I can't scream too much. It'll ruin my beautiful singing voice!
A log ride in the summer is SO fun. It's like a camping trip that gets interrupted by a waterfall!
You'd go bungee jumping? I could NOT EVEN IMAGINE doing that! Eeep!I get scared when I'm up on my roof, you know, pretending to give a concert.
Today I'm going to teach you all about how pop stars express themselves!
First up, DANCING!<10_4 /> 'K. Mostly, when you're onstageyou just let the music move you!Strut your stuff, ! Let everybody know you're cool!
Audiences like it when you make them laugh. Just make sure it's on purpose

You need to be able toSTRIKE A POSE any time you feel like it!You'll really blow their minds! Like, you could hit 'em at any moment! They'll never see it coming! Do it a few times and the audience will be all, "They can't do it again!"<10_4 /> So that's WHEN YOU HIT 'EM AGAIN!
I'm already a pretty great dancer, but I'd still take lessons. Maybe learn a new move.

I could learn to samba! That's a fab dance from Brazil!When you hear a samba tune, your body starts to move all by itself. And then you can't stop!Sometimes it never stops and you have to yell for help, !

I'd love to try on a pair of ballet slippers and one of those fancy tutus! I bet I'd feel so pretty!Most pop stars aren't ballet dancers, but sometimes I practice standing on my tippy toes just for fun.

Hula is so fantastic! Waaay back, Hawaiians had an oral history instead of a written one.They recorded history in song. Like who was fab, or lame, or cute— the important stuff!A hula dancer's moves tell the song's story. They're the movie to history's soundtrack! Bonus? Hula-dancer clothes are SO cool! I have to find out if I can be a hula dancer. I'd bet I'd be great!
I'm already a pretty great dancer, but I'd still take lessons. Maybe learn a new move.

Tap dancers are neat. It's kind of like they play percussion as they dance! Isn't that cool?!It's like one person doing two people's jobs. That must save bands a lot of money, huh?Whoa Is this what they mean by working on a shoestring budget?Get it? Shoestring? Tap shoes? <10_4 />I'm not sure you get it.
I'd love to be able to break-dance but I've never figured it out! See, I only really know two dances
With flamenco, the music is just full of passion!And the clothes? Soooo CUTE! I'd look crazy great in one of those dresses!Once I buy my flamenco dress, I can totally start learning the dance!

They had this silent cooking competition on TV the other day, which was weird, but also AWESOME!They had to make a five-course meal in an hour and never make a sound! There were microphones everywhere!The guy who won got a new set of pots and pans. That'd be a fab prize to getI don't cook much, but pots make très great drums!

They had this poker-face competition on TV the other day, and it was AWESOME!<10_4 /> AND WEIRD!Contestants won a lifetime supply of socks if they could keep a straight face while their feet were tickled.I bet I'd do alright on that show. I could use the socks too.

There was a "pretend sleeping" competition on TV the other day. It was AWESOME!They would do all sorts of stuff to get the contestants to open their eyes. It was SO intense!The winner? They fell asleep! For real! They didn't even wake up when the show was OVER!
I need to get on one of these shows!
Bet you couldn't beat me in a game of Who Can Sing Along with the TV Louder, !
Bet you couldn't beat me in a game of Who Can Practice Signing Their Name Faster, !
Bet you couldn't beat me in a game of Who Can Imagine Being a Celebrity, !

Ever heard of "dance crafting"? It's the latest trend and my new favorite thing. Basically, you come up with a theme and then invent a dance that encapsulates it on the spot. Let me show you how it's done!

The first theme that comes to mind is a book I borrowed from a few weeks ago.
was the title and it was aboutOh yeah. I never read it.I started it, I swear! But it was really late at night and the book was so thick and my blanket was so cozy. Anyhoo, I guess the dance would go something like this
Let's make the theme a random hobby, like! Perfect, ! Well, other than the fact that I don't really know anything about it.Hmm. How about I do some research and then I'll get back to you?

I've got the most perfect theme! The !Now I just have to get into the head space of .I am . I am .
That was incredible! I barely recognized myself for a minute there.Those online acting classes are really paying off!
Listen to this! I've GOT to tell you what happened the last time I hung out with .

We were playing a game where we both closed our eyes and tried to draw foods without looking.Trust me—it's harder than it sounds! I was sure I had a decent-looking in progressBut when we opened our eyes, we had both flubbed it SO hard! It did make us pretty hungry though.

We were playing a game where we flipped open a random page in a magazine Then we had to copy a pose from a photo on that page! It was fun, but I definitely sprained something. I'm totes up for playing that again as long as we can shift to a sitting- based magazine. Oof.

We were vegging out, watching some TV, and trying to guess when each commercial break would end.Not to brag, but I watch a LOT of TV, so I won pretty much every round.I just need to come up with a less complicated victory dance. I ended up missing half of the actual show!
Ooh! We should try that together too! You and me! That would be MEGA fun, .
